mapper.select: select * from p_watch w ,p_brand b ,p_core c ,p_material m ,p_origin o ,p_style s where w.b_id = b.b_id and w.c_id = c.c_id and w.m_id = m.m_id and w.o_id = o.o_id and w.s_id = s.s_id and w.w_id = #{id}
mapper.update: update p_watch set w_image = #{image},w_image1 = #{image1},w_image2 = #{image2},w_image3 = #{image3} ,w_image4 = #{image4},w_image5 = #{image5},w_image6 = #{image6},w_image7 = #{image7},w_image8 = #{image8} where w_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from p_watch w ,p_style s where w.s_id = s.s_id order by w.w_id Desc limit #{start},#{over}

select * from p_watch w, p_style s where w.b_id in (select b_id from p_brand where b_des = #{styleDes} ) and w.w_type = #{type} and w.s_id = s.s_id order by w.w_id desc limit #{pager.beginIndex}, #{pager.pageSize}
select count(w.w_id) from p_watch w where w.b_id in (select b_id from p_brand where b_des = #{styleDes} ) and w.w_type = #{type}

select * from p_watch w LEFT JOIN p_style s on w.s_id = s.s_id where 1 = 1
and w.w_des like concat('%', #{watch.des}, '%')
or w.w_title like concat('%', #{watch.title}, '%')
or w.w_function like concat('%', #{watch.function}, '%')
order by w.w_id Desc limit #{pager.beginIndex}, #{pager.pageSize}

select count(w_id) from p_watch where 1 = 1
and w_des like concat('%', #{des}, '%')
or w_title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
or w_function like concat('%', #{function}, '%')
select * from p_watch w, p_style s where w.w_type = #{type} and w.s_id = s.s_id order by w.w_id desc limit #{pager.beginIndex}, #{pager.pageSize}
select count(w.w_id) from p_watch w where w.w_type = #{type}

select count(w.w_id) from p_watch w LEFT JOIN p_brand b on w.b_id = b.b_id LEFT JOIN p_style s on w.s_id = s.s_id where 1 = 1
and w.w_type = #{type}
and w.b_id = #{brandId}
and w.w_price <= 2000
and w.w_price >= 2000 and w.w_price <= 3500
and w.w_price >= 3500 and w.w_price <= 4500
and w.w_price >= 4500 and w.w_price <= 5500
and w.w_price >= 5500

select count(w.w_id) from p_watch w where 1 = 1 and (w.w_table = '正品' or w.w_table = '原单' or w.w_table = '正品原单')
and w.b_id = #{brandId}
